short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Uses Gemini API to summarize webpages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Website Summarizer is a powerful Chrome extension designed to streamline your web browsing experience. With a single click, it leverages the cutting-edge Gemini API to generate concise summaries of web pages, providing you with key insights without overwhelming details. The extension's intuitive interface allows users to interact with an AI chatbot, enabling seamless conversations about the summarized content. Whether you're researching, studying, or simply looking to grasp the essence of lengthy articles, Website Summarizer is your go-to tool for efficient information consumption. Additionally, it prioritizes user privacy by not collecting any personal data, ensuring a secure and trustworthy browsing environment.
